item.title: Test Scanner (scanner emulator) in SANE - Linux
item.description:
2024 Hacktoberfest has begun, and I decided to dive into some open-source contributions! One project that caught my eye was the Scanner Server. It offers a web interface for using scanners, which seemed pretty interesting.

I was eager to contribute but quickly realized I didnâ€™t have a scanner to test it with ğŸ˜…. Fortunately, Linuxâ€™s SANE (Scanner Access Now Easy) software comes to the rescue! It includes a feature that lets you select a test scanner model. With this, you always have a virtual scanner called â€œtestâ€ available. While it only scans a black image, it behaves just like a real scanner for all practical purposes.
